articles.title: Argentina hero Emiliano Martinez blasts Dutch coach Louis van Gaal in messy fallout to World Cup classic
articles.description: A war of words has erupted after Argentina’s fiery win over the Netherlands.
articles.content:
Argentina goalkeeper Emiliano Martinez has told outgoing Netherlands coach Louis van Gaal to “keep his mouth shut” after saving two penalties in an ill-tempered World Cup quarter-final shootout win.

articles.title: World Cup roundup: Unpacking the drama as Brazil falls, Argentina escapes
articles.description: Trending News & Rumors for Football, Basketball, Baseball, Hockey, Soccer & More
articles.content:
The 2022 World Cup is in full swing. At the end of every matchday, we'll review the biggest talking points emanating from Qatar and break down all the action on the pitch. Below, we look back on Friday's epic quarterfinal games.

articles.title: Maradona is watching us from above and pushing us, says Messi
articles.description: Lionel Messi said Argentina have felt the presence of the late, great Diego Maradona throughout their World Cup campaign, including on Friday when they beat the Netherlands on penalties to reach the semi-finals.
articles.content:
LUSAIL, Qatar, Dec 9 (Reuters) - Lionel Messi said Argentina have felt the presence of the late, great Diego Maradona throughout their World Cup campaign, including on Friday when they beat the Netherlands on penalties to reach the semi-finals.
Messi... [2274 chars]

articles.title: Lionel Messi slams Louis van Gaal for 'long balls' as Argentina beat Netherlands | Emi Martinez: Referee was useless
articles.description: Argentina beat the Netherlands 4-3 in a penalty shootout to keep Lionel Messis World Cup dream alive; Messi: Louis van Gaal says that they play good football, but what he did was put on tall people and hit long balls
articles.content:
Lionel Messi has twisted the knife into the Netherlands' World Cup exit after criticising Louis van Gaal's side for their direct approach in Argentina's dramatic and heated quarter-final win on Friday evening in Lusail.
